Description: Body sherd (mended from two fragments) of Attic pottery Gordion cup; interior glazed black; exterior: reserved handle zone; brownish-black band below; black lower body; inscription in handle zone.
Curator's comments: The sherd belongs to the same vessel as British Museum 1888,0601.432.
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (B601.6.3)
